title: 84/577/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 November 1984 amending Council Decision 82/731/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Finland approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 14 November 1984
amending Council Decision 82/731/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Finland approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(84/577/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 82/731/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 November 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
